statusLine.command: input=$(cat); dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); user=$(whoami); host=$(hostname -s); output=$(printf "\033[2m\033[32m%s@%s\033[0m" "$user" "$host"); output="$output$(printf " \033[2m\033[36m%s\033[0m" "$(basename "$dir")")" ; if cd "$dir" 2>/dev/null; then branch=$(git --no-optional-locks branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then output="$output$(printf " \033[2m\033[35mon\033[0m \033[2m\033[35m%s\033[0m" "$branch")"; git_status=$(git --no-optional-locks status --porcelain 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$git_status" ]; then modified=$(echo "$git_status" | grep -c "^ M" || echo 0); added=$(echo "$git_status" | grep -c "^??" || echo 0); deleted=$(echo "$git_status" | grep -c "^ D" || echo 0); indicators=""; [ "$modified" -gt 0 ] && indicators="${indicators}!"; [ "$added" -gt 0 ] && indicators="${indicators}?"; [ "$deleted" -gt 0 ] && indicators="${indicators}âœ˜"; if [ -n "$indicators" ]; then output="$output$(printf " \033[2m\033[31m[%s]\033[0m" "$indicators")"; fi; fi; fi; fi; output="$output$(printf " \033[2m\033[34mvia\033[0m \033[2m\033[34m%s\033[0m" "$model")"; echo "$output"
